SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT EmailSendAccountID,EmailID,EmailAccountID,EmailSendAccountCreateTime FROM emailsendaccount WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailSendAccountID=@@EmailSendAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailSendAccountCreateTime=@@EmailSendAccountCreateTime@@%>;
